comment: Claude Code Session Hooks for Infrastructure Governance

SessionStart.command:
echo '
🔍 Infrastructure Governance Active:
  ✅ Required tags: merge(local.required_tags)
  ✅ Encryption: KMS only (no AES256)
  ✅ Naming: kebab-case (resources), snake_case (variables)
